property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Accessor that gets a resource from a file or ULR.

property.name: trigger (port)
property.value: Send a token to this input to read the file or URL.

property.name: output (port)
property.value: The contents of the file or URL.

property.name: resource (port)
property.value: The file or URL to be read. Defaults to the Accessors home page (http://accessors.org).

property.name: timeout (port)
property.value: The timeout in milleseconds. Defaults to 3000 ms., which is 3 seconds.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Display data on the console using util.inspect().

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Accessor that spontaneously produces outputs once per time interval. This implementation produces a counting sequence.

property.name: output (port)
property.value: Output for the counting sequence, of type number.

property.name: interval (parameter)
property.value: The interval between outputs in milliseconds.
